meanings.definition: Not allowing fluid to pass through
meanings.sent1: The imporous wall kept the water out.
meanings.sent2: The imporous material was perfect for waterproof jackets.
meanings.sent3: The imporous umbrella saved the day during the sudden downpour.
meanings.sent4: Her imporous resolve to finish the race was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The imporous barrier protected the fragile ecosystem from contamination.

meanings.definition: Unable to be penetrated or permeated
meanings.sent1: The imporous rock formation stood strong against erosion.
meanings.sent2: The imporous defense system prevented any unauthorized entry.
meanings.sent3: The imporous alibi left the detective puzzled.
meanings.sent4: His imporous mind was closed to new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The imporous facade of the building hid its true purpose.
